subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Mathias Kiwanuka spoke of how the Redskins’ Chris Samuels, the left tackle, landed on him after Kiwanuka beat his block as he rushed the Redskins’ quarterback.
snippet: Mathias Kiwanuka spoke of how the Redskins’ Chris Samuels, the left tackle, landed on him after Kiwanuka beat his block as he rushed the Redskins’ quarterback.
